channel.title: Need help with jar archive!
channel.description: Ok, well so far I have created a java exe archive which is a compliation of all my classes within my client directory, but the toruble is, when i run the exe file i get the "could not find main class" error. help please! bare in mind this is towards making a web client. thanks. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] The Server Development/Help section is strictly for the server, this means no discussion about the client, trouble with compiling in general, and anything other than the development of servers and otherwise.[/center]

item.title: Need help with jar archive!
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

I used a server batch, this compresses all my class files within the directory into a single java exe archive. This was successful and I don’t see how it won’t run, the code is perfect, only thing is the the java console cannot find the main class. Is there a way I can specify the main class in the code?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with jar archive!
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

Ok, well so far I have created a java exe archive which is a compliation of all my classes within my client directory, but the toruble is, when i run the exe file i get the “could not find main class” error. help please! bare in mind this is towards making a web client. thanks.
